name: RemObjects Definition Language File
summary: Learn about .RODL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When implementing the RemObjects services, the RODL files are used to auto-generate source code skeletons. Then the developer can fill in the functional code that executes the logic for the services.
NOTE: The RemObjects SDK is used as an extension of common development IDEs such as Microsoft Visual Studio and Delphi.

description: Developer file created by RemObjects SDK, a software development application used for building middle-tier software; uses and XML format and defines the services provided by the developed software, including the API and supported data formats; used as the interface, or user specification, for how to interact with the services.
